放松方法可暂时缓解高血压放松技术可能有助于降低高血压 - 至少在短期内，但长期影响尚不清楚。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/relaxation-methods-methods-offer-temporary-relief-for-----------apx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/relaxation-methods-methods-offer-temporary-relief-for------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30b555664-381f-4377-A377-A3D1-4E3490014577 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 02:18:28 -0400 Relaxation methods offer temporary relief for high blood pressure
研究表明，西班牙女性的月经不适感很高西班牙国家研究委员会（CSIC）的联合中心和政治上的政治中心（UPV）的一项研究，UPV的应用数学系和西澳大利亚大学的应用学院表明，每一个月或几乎每个月都有70.9％的女性，每月70.9％的女性在每月或几乎每月都有70.9％的妇女。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-high-prevalence-of-menstrual-discomfort-discomfort-discomfort-mong-mong-mong-women-women-n-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-high-prevalence-of-menstrual-discomfort-discomfort-discomfort-among-mong-women-women-women-pain-aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e5a2-0da2-0db3-4918-bb27-72b27-72b7cd56b339 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 02:16:37 -0400 Study reveals high prevalence of menstrual discomfort among women in Spain
微小的面部运动可以帮助更好地了解自闭症患者的社交交流罗格斯大学新不伦瑞克省研究人员领导的一项研究表明，微小的面部运动 - 太少了，无法引起人们的注意 - 可以帮助科学家更好地了解自闭症患者的社交交流。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tiny-facial-movements-could-help-better-better-socterd-soccial-social-social-social-social-communication in-autistic-indistivuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/tiny-facial-movements-could-help-better-better-undercal-soccial-social-social-social-social-communication in-autistic-invidivuals.aspx#comments.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B6D92D48-1B80-49A6-A54B-96AC8C2E4053 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 02:09:13 -0400 Tiny facial movements could help better understand social communication in autistic individuals
征求紧急支持，因为美国资金削减威胁艾滋病毒/艾滋病计划面对对美国外国援助计划的持续资金中断，一群国际专家呼吁采取紧急行动，以确保挽救生命的干预措施以及对撒哈拉以南非洲艾滋病毒/艾滋病影响的儿童和家庭的支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/call-for-urgent-support-as-as-us-funding-cuts-threats-theaten-hivaids-programs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/call-for-urgent-support-as-as-us-funding-cuts-cuts-theaten-hivaids-programs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=C1B58C5-8CA3-4965-96FC-D0531AE9A2AE Wed, 09 Apr 2025 02:07:25 -0400 Call for urgent support as US funding cuts threaten HIV/AIDS programs
研究发现听力障碍与心力衰竭风险之间的联系听力损失与患心力衰竭的风险增加有关，这是由于在观察到的关联中扮演关键作用而造成的心理困扰，发现一项大型的长期研究，在《心脏》杂志上在线发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-finds-connection-connection-neard-herning-migning-migntment-and-hendt-failure-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-finds-connection-connection-neard-hind-hind-hens-mimpairment-and-mimpairment-and-hent-failure-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f87001D2-989D-402E-B2A6-B2A6-B3DBA787BE69 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 01:40:34 -0400 Study finds connection between hearing impairment and heart failure risk
雄性成对的小鼠表现出在协调恐惧反应的韧性面对潜在的威胁时，老鼠经常冻结。此外，当两只动物在一起时，它们通常同时冻结，与彼此的不动时期相匹配。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/male-female-pairs-of-mice-show-show-ishow-isilience-in-coordination-fear-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/male-female-pairs-of-mice-show-show-ishow-isilience-in-coordination-fear-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e70ddded0dddded0-f082-42be-87E5-5BA490CEEEEB Wed, 09 Apr 2025 01:28:00 -0400 Male-female pairs of mice show resilience in coordinating fear responses
新的奖项，以认识将神经科学与精神病诊断和治疗联系起来的贡献心理健康正在全球危机。尽管神经科学正在迅速发展，但精神病学仍在努力诊断和有效治疗许多疾病。瑞士日内瓦大学的神经科学与心理健康研究中心正在启动新的国际奖，以奖励那些将这两个世界更加亲密的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-award-to-to-recognize-contribines-link-neuroscience-neuroscience-to-sphichiatric-diantric-diantric-diancnosis-and-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/new-award-to-to-recognize-contribines-link-ninking-neuroscience-to-sphichiatiric-sphichiatric-diantric-dianction-diancnosis-and-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7db3283-32aa-4127-bc9c-64e8fdee26da Wed, 09 Apr 2025 01:27:14 -0400 New award to recognize contributions linking neuroscience to psychiatric diagnosis and treatment
QRICH1蛋白发现为癌症和自身免疫疗法开辟了新的途径在对小鼠免疫系统的研究中，约翰·霍普金斯医学的科学家说，他们发现了蛋白质QRICH1的新作用，该蛋白可能成为药物拨入或下降T细胞激活T细胞以对抗癌症和自身免疫性疾病的靶标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/qrich1-protein-discovery-opens-new-avenues-for-cancer-cancer-and-cancer-and-automune-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/qrich1-protein-discovery-opens-new-avenues-for-cancer-for-cancer-and-cancer-and-automune-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a8e63fb-214d-4c23-854f-19a522222f1ecf3 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 01:23:59 -0400 QRICH1 protein discovery opens new avenues for cancer and autoimmune therapies
